word: GOD INVITES US TO COME TO HIM IN THE NAME OF JESUS.\97You are invited to come, to ask, to seek, to knock; and you are assured that you will not come in vain. Jesus says, \93Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you: for everyone that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.\94 Matthew 7:7, 8.
